s.text: The spot is aimed at the woman, the secondary consumer of condoms, reminding her that an alternative to "no" is "wait a minute," followed by a quick dip into her nightstand drawer for a rubber.
So most of the ads you see on television, believe it or not, are certified as true, defensible, and tasteful.
Forget Me Not , produced for Ansell Inc. by Rick Starbuck of Santa Barbara, Calif.
Speaking of drawers: The third-place finisher, Forget Me Not , features an animated condom in a drawer.
